short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Personalized Online Stationery. Create & Email Stationery As Ecards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to eStationery app, the haven for email stationery, email letterhead and eCards. eStationery brings to you thousands of templates for all types of email stationery, email letterhead for various purposes and eCards catering to every occasion, season, event and festival for all and sundry.

You can choose from more than 25 different categories of email stationery, email letterhead and eCards and all templates offer you the complete luxury of customization. You can choose your own content, write any message you wish to convey, decide on the style, font and design of the message and simply send it across to the recipient right from the website. If you so desire, you can also copy the templates onto your email and send it from there.

With eStationery at your discretion, you would never need any other resource again to cater to your needs of email stationery, email letterhead or eCards.
